title: How to learn Javascript
content:
How to Learn JavaScript – A Beginner’s Roadmap

🔸 What is JavaScript?

JavaScript (JS) is a high-level, dynamic programming language and one of the core technologies of the web, alongside HTML and CSS. It enables interactive web experiences and is supported by all modern browsers.

🔸 Why Learn JavaScript?

  • 🌍 Powers 99% of websites
  • ⚙️ Works both on frontend (browser) and backend (via Node.js)
  • 🧠 Easy to get started but powerful for complex apps
  • 🌐 Huge ecosystem and job opportunities

🔸 JavaScript Fundamentals

  1. Variables and Data Types (let, const, var)
  2. Functions and Arrow Functions
  3. Control Flow (if-else, switch)
  4. Loops (for, while, forEach)
  5. DOM Manipulation
  6. Events and Event Listeners

🔸 Example Code

 function greet(name) { return `Hello, ${name}!`; } console.log(greet("Shubhra"));

🔸 Moving Forward

  • 📦 Learn modern JS features (ES6+)
  • 📜 Explore asynchronous JavaScript (Promises, async/await)
  • ⚛️ Learn libraries and frameworks like React, Vue, or Angular
  • 🌐 Understand APIs and JSON

🔸 Useful Resources

  • MDN JavaScript Guide
  • The Modern JavaScript Tutorial
  • FreeCodeCamp JavaScript Course

🚀 Start building simple projects like: a calculator, a to-do app, or a quiz game. Learning by doing is the best way!

Happy Coding! ✨
